text: the Trump bandwagon rolls on the
billionaire businessman streaks ahead of
his opponents and dominating the debate
but not everyone likes his message and
here in Portsmouth some turned out to
tell him he wasn't just wrong but
dangerous I believe that he is says
stuff that is dangerous you bet him away
well I think what he does is provide
fuel to the crazy people who are who are
what I think are causing most of the
trouble but mr. Trump's uncompromising
views resonates strongly with many
Americans and this is why we've gotten
way too politically correct in this
country we need a fresh new face fresh
new speak and get us back down to Ground
Zero gets back down to reality protect
this country and do what it takes to
make that's great again Donald Trump was
here to get the backing for his
presidential bid from a police Welfare
Fund he promised them the death penalty
for all those who killed police officers
and that toughest stance on Muslims
coming into America we've got to get
down to the problems we can't worry
about being politically correct we just
can't afford anymore to be so
politically correct another night
another endorsement for Donald Trump the
momentum keeps building as the
grassroots like him more party
establishment seem to like him less Gary
O'Donoghue BBC News New Hampshire
